name: MEGA Dark
description:
Dark version of Kim Dotcom's MEGA (previously Megaupload).

Supports both mega.co.nz and mega.nz sites
additional_info:
30 June 2016 - Added styling for Chrome extension
16 February 2015 - Oddly, this style was not being indexed under mega.nz properly on userstyles. (Installs per week were down to 20 since 2015-12-15...!)
11 August 2015  - Fixes to mega.nz
30 June 2015 - Added mega.nz domain
14 February 2015 - Cleaned up style (was pretty rough looking before)
16 November 2014 - Added MEGA extension support.

discussions.name: Some white block on transition of load and download screen fix
